title: Synergistic bimetallic MOF-integrated MXene nanosheets for enhanced catalytic degradation of carbamazepine and hydrogen production: a dual-function approach for water remediation and energy applications
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00324A, Paper
Van-Anh Thai, Thanh-Binh Nguyen, Chiu-Wen Chen, Xuan-Thanh Bui, Ruey-an Doong, Cheng-Di Dong
The MIL-100@ZIF-67@MXene composite was synthesized for the enhanced degradation of carbamazepine (CBZ) and activation of peroxymonosulfate (PMS).
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
